author: Kevin Webb
title: Apple is reportedly considering a subscription bundle for Apple Music and its streaming service Apple TV Plus, but the music industry is worried it will lose money on the deal (AAPL)
description: Apple is considering packaging Apple Music and the upcoming Apple TV Plus as a combined subscription, according to a new report from the Financial Times. Apple Music is currently available for $10 a month, and Apple TV Plus will launch on November 1 for $5 pe…
content:
Apple TV Plus hasn't launched yet, but Apple has already considered packaging its on-demand video service with its streaming music service, Apple Music.
A new report from Anna Nicolaou and Patrick McGee of the Financial Times says that Apple has entered into… [+1635 chars]
